summary:
Forty years of professional experience, divided between development assistance and economic transition in Africa, Asia, Eastern Europe and Oceania. More than 25 years of team & consultants management for different clients, including Council of Europe, DfID, Dutch Cooperation, European Commission, GIZ, IOM, UNDP & World Bank Group.

Country experience:
Asia: China, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Mongolia, Myanmar, India, Philippines, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Uzbekistan, Vietnam & other S.E. Asian Region.
Africa: Cape Verde, Ghana, Guinea Bissau, Mauritius, Morocco, Nigeria, Rwanda, Uganda, Zambia & East African Community.
Arab States and Near East: Jordan & Palestine
EU, (potential) EU-Candidate Countries & Neighbourhood countries: Albania, Belgium, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Estonia, Georgia, Germany, Hungary, Kosovo, Latvia, Lithuania, Macedonia, Moldova, Montenegro, Poland, Romania, Russia, Serbia, Slovenia & Turkey.
Pacific Region: Cook Islands, Fiji, Kiribati, Nauru, New Caledonia, Niue, Papua New Guinea, Samoa, Solomon Islands, Tonga, Tuvalu & Vanuatu.
 
Successful assignments in the areas of M&E, governance, public administration & civil service reform,  judiciary & legal reform, privatisation & enterprise restructuring, regional & SME development.

Policy development in the areas of public administration reform and regional integration.

Monitoring, evaluation & learning(MEL), results chain and theory of change, including methodology development and economic and financial cost benefit analysis.
 
Aid coordination and delivery, encompassing budget management, institutional capacity building and human resources management.

Specialties: Policy development, public governance, M&E, project management, EU procedures (blending, budget support, CIR, DCI, ENPI, IPA, joint programming & Structural Instruments) and IFI procedures (Council of Europe, EBRD, UNDP & WB); project cycle management (PCM). 

Project identification, design and assessment, planning & programming. Training. Writing, editing & reporting quality control.
